item.title: Why NASA is landing another spacecraft on Mars
item.description: To get the Biker Mice to Earth. That’s true, sheeple, NASA wants illegal aliens in our planet, so they can steal our jobs, rape our wives and all that crazy shit typically written by delusional right-wing folks. Jokes apart, tune in the NASA livestream if you want to watch the landing.
